Body: My Droid Pro's physical keyboard backlight turns off after an fixed length of time, whether I'm texting, browsing, or sitting idle watching video. I've gone through every setting I can find in all the apps and phone modes I can think of and can't find a way to lengthen the amount of time it remains on or disable the auto-off feature. This is very annoying when texting in the dark if I don't have the availability of both hands to rotate the phone and use the virtual keyboard on screen. Is there any way to prevent the backlight from turning off automatically?
Title: How can I prevent my keyboard backlight from turning off automatically?
